text:
#Pandemic #Covid19 year - #Volatile year on #financial #markets
The #combination of the different stimuli and positive news about the #vaccine, made the market go positive! 
🥇🥈🥉 An overview thanks to @VisualCap!
#Gold was up 24.6%, but the best commodity was #Silver 47.4% up! https://t.co/hALwTgMy7d
